metadata.synopsis: AD with Korrilla and Archivist, where Korrilla says that she's here to "observe the events that are about to unfold".
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Teleport to Archive and stay hiddenteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_ArchiveADTrigger

0.speaker: Archivist
0.text: The master is very indulgent of you, Korrilla, but I will not let you bring disorder into the Archive.
0.context: NodeContext: Extremely agitated/panicky (scared of Raphael's wrath)

1.speaker: Korrilla
1.text: I'm not bringing anything, you little fusspot. I'm just here to watch the story unfold.
